verses.verse: And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> into the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gerasenes.<s%>

And when He had <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> from the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> with an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G5221>met<s%> Him,

and he <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G2731>dwelling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3418>tombs.<s%> And <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1210>bind<s%> him <S%G3765>anymore,<s%> <S%G3761>even<s%> with a <S%G254>chain;<s%>

<S%G1223>because<s%> he had <S%G4178>often<s%> been <S%G1210>bound<s%> with <S%G3976>shackles<s%> and <S%G254>chains,<s%> and the <S%G254>chains<s%> had been <S%G1288>torn<s%> <S%G1288>apart<s%> by him, and the <S%G3976>shackles<s%> <S%G4937>broken<s%> in <S%G4937>pieces,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G2480>strong<s%> <S%G2480>enough<s%> to <S%G1150>subdue<s%> him.

And <S%G1223>constantly<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3418>tombs<s%> and in the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> he was <S%G2896>crying<s%> out and <S%G2629>gashing<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> with <S%G3037>stones.<s%>
And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from a <S%G3113>distance,<s%> he <S%G5143>ran<s%> up and <S%G4352>bowed<s%> <S%G4352>down<s%> <S%G4352>before<s%> Him;

and <S%G2896>crying<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do I have to do with You, <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G5310>Most<s%> <S%G5310>High<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>? I <S%G3726>implore<s%> You by <S%G2316>God,<s%> do not <S%G928>torment<s%> me!"
For He had been <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G1831>"Come<s%> out of the <S%G444>man,<s%> you <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit!<s%>"
And He was <S%G1905>asking<s%> him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> is your <S%G3686>name<s%>?" And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "My <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G3003>Legion;<s%> for we are <S%G4183>many.<s%>"
And he [began] to <S%G3870>entreat<s%> Him <S%G4183>earnestly<s%> not to <S%G649>send<s%> them out of the <S%G5561>country.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there was a <S%G3173>big<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> on the <S%G3735>mountain.<s%>
And [the demons] <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3992>"Send<s%> us into the <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that we may <S%G1525>enter<s%> them."

And He <S%G2010>gave<s%> them <S%G2010>permission.<s%> And <S%G1831>coming<s%> out, the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G5519>swine;<s%> and the <S%G34>herd<s%> <S%G3729>rushed<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> the <S%G2911>steep<s%> <S%G2911>bank<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1367>two<s%> <S%G1367>thousand<s%> [of them]; and they were <S%G4155>drowned<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And their <S%G1006>herdsmen<s%> <S%G5343>ran<s%> <S%G5343>away<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> it in the <S%G4172>city<s%> and [out] in the <S%G68>country.<s%> And [the people] <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> it was that had <S%G1096>happened.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G2334>observed<s%> the man who had been demon-possessed <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G2521>down,<s%> <S%G2439>clothed<s%> and in his <S%G4993>right<s%> <S%G4993>mind,<s%> the very man who had <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3003>"legion<s%>"; and they became <S%G5399>frightened.<s%>

And <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G3708>seen<s%> it <S%G1334>described<s%> to them <S%G4459>how<s%> it had <S%G1096>happened<s%> to the demon-possessed man, and [all] <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5519>swine.<s%>
And they <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3870>entreat<s%> Him to <S%G565>depart<s%> from their <S%G3725>region.<s%>
And as He was <S%G1684>getting<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> the man who had been demon-possessed was <S%G3870>entreating<s%> Him that he might <S%G3326>accompany<s%> <S%G1510><s%> Him.

And He did not <S%G863>let<s%> him, but He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>"Go<s%> <S%G3624>home<s%> to your <S%G4674>people<s%> and <S%G518>report<s%> to them <S%G3745>what<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> <S%G3745>things<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> for you, and [how] He <S%G1653>had<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on you."

And he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> in <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> <S%G3745>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> for him; and <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G2296>marveled.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1276>crossed<s%> <S%G1276>over<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> Him; and He <S%G1510>stayed<s%> by the <S%G2281>seashore.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>officials<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2383>Jairus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> up, and upon <S%G3708>seeing<s%> Him, <S%G4098>fell<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet,<s%>

and <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him <S%G4183>earnestly,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "My <S%G2365>little<s%> <S%G2365>daughter<s%> is at the <S%G2079>point<s%> of <S%G2079>death;<s%> [please] <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> Your <S%G5495>hands<s%> on her, that she may <S%G4982>get<s%> <S%G4982>well<s%> and <S%G2198>live.<s%>"
And He <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>off<s%> with him; and a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G190>following<s%> Him and <S%G4918>pressing<s%> in on Him.
And a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who had <S%G1510>had<s%> a <S%G4511>hemorrhage<s%> <S%G129><s%> for <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

and had <S%G3958>endured<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> at the <S%G5259>hands<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2395>physicians,<s%> and had <S%G1159>spent<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that she <S%G3844>had<s%> and was not <S%G5623>helped<s%> at <S%G3367>all,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> had <S%G2064>grown<s%> <S%G5501>worse,<s%>
after <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> up in the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> [Him,] and <S%G681>touched<s%> His <S%G2440>cloak.<s%>
For she <S%G3004>thought,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G2579>just<s%> <S%G681>touch<s%> His <S%G2440>garments,<s%> I shall <S%G4982>get<s%> well."

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G4077>flow<s%> of her <S%G129>blood<s%> was <S%G3583>dried<s%> up; and she <S%G1097>felt<s%> in her <S%G4983>body<s%> that she was <S%G2390>healed<s%> of her <S%G3148>affliction.<s%>

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1921>perceiving<s%> in <S%G1438>Himself<s%> that the <S%G1411>power<s%> [proceeding] from Him had <S%G1831>gone<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1994>around<s%> in the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G681>touched<s%> My <S%G2440>garments<s%>?"

And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "You <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4918>pressing<s%> in on You, and You <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G5101>'Who<s%> <S%G681>touched<s%> Me?'"
And He <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G4017>around<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> the woman who had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3778>this.<s%>

But the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> and <S%G5141>trembling,<s%> <S%G3609>aware<s%> of <S%G3739>what<s%> had <S%G1096>happened<s%> to her, <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4363>down<s%> <S%G4363>before<s%> Him, and <S%G3004>told<s%> Him the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G2364>"Daughter,<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>well;<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and be <S%G5199>healed<s%> of your <S%G3148>affliction.<s%>"

While He was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> from the [house of] the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>official,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Your <S%G2364>daughter<s%> has <S%G599>died;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G4660>trouble<s%> the <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> <S%G2089>anymore<s%>?"

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3878>overhearing<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> <S%G3056><s%> was being <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>official,<s%> "Do not be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> [any longer,] <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4100>believe.<s%>"

And He <S%G863>allowed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> to <S%G4870>follow<s%> with Him, <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3624>house<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>official;<s%> and He <S%G2334>beheld<s%> a <S%G2351>commotion,<s%> and [people] <S%G4183>loudly<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> and <S%G214>wailing.<s%>

And <S%G1525>entering<s%> in, He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G2350>make<s%> a <S%G2350>commotion<s%> and <S%G2799>weep<s%>? The <S%G3813>child<s%> has not <S%G599>died,<s%> but is <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>"

And they [began] <S%G2606>laughing<s%> at Him. But <S%G1544>putting<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> out, He <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G3880>along<s%> the <S%G3813>child<s%>'s <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother<s%> and His own <S%G3588>companions,<s%> <S%G3326><s%> and <S%G1531>entered<s%> [the room] <S%G3699>where<s%> the child was.

And <S%G2902>taking<s%> the <S%G3813>child<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G5008>"Talitha<s%> <S%G2891>kum!<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> <S%G3177>translated<s%> <S%G1510>means,<s%> <S%G2877>"Little<s%> <S%G2877>girl,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1453>arise!<s%>" ).

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G2877>girl<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> and [began] to <S%G4043>walk;<s%> for she was <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> old. And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> they were <S%G1611>completely<s%> <S%G3173><s%> <S%G1839>astounded.<s%>

And He <S%G1291>gave<s%> them <S%G4183>strict<s%> <S%G1291>orders<s%> that <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> should <S%G1097>know<s%> about <S%G3778>this;<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> that [something] should be <S%G1325>given<s%> her to <S%G2068>eat.<s%>
